Texts.Eng: A freakin' ^orange;DINOSAUR EGG^reset;?!??! Wow! What can we do with it, I wonder?
A natural alcohol, ^orange;Methanol^reset; can be used in a variety of ways in your lab. The easiest way to obtain it is through simply placing some ^cyan;Wood^reset; in an ^orange;Extractor^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 组织培养物是在涉及到遗传学中必不可少的实验材料，它会帮助你开拓全新的遗传学领域！
Texts.Eng: Absolutely essential in lab work involving genetics, tissue cultures open the gate to whole new areas of experimentation.

Texts.Chs: 好吧……我觉得你不应该碰从那个可怕生物身上掉下来的肉。不过，我觉得应该会派上用场的。
Texts.Eng: Allright...you probably shouldn't have touched this stuff. Flesh from that hideous beast. Ew. But I am positive it will be useful.

Texts.Chs: 惊人，这似乎是一块残缺的先驱无人机控制芯片。我会将其发送回飞船并下载星际标准语言到它的数据库，您返回的时候就可以将它重新启动了。
Texts.Eng: Amazing. This seems to be the control chip for a defective Precursor drone. I'll beam it back to the ship and download Galactic Standard Tongue to its databanks. It'll be ready to reboot by the time you return.
An unusual ^orange;Strange Nodule^reset; that pulses with an unnusual signature, it bears both organic and inorganic markers. It might provide some useful function in a laboratory setting.

Texts.Chs: 矿物原料可以从大多数石头中通过萃取获得。请尽可能地储存多一些。
Texts.Eng: Another staple ingredient in the lab, raw minerals can be easily obtained from most types of stone via extraction. Stockpile as much as possible.

Biofuel and organic research are two direct benefits to harvesting large amounts of ^orange;Algae^reset;. It can make all the difference in travel. To create Bio-Fuel you'll need to research ^orange;Chemistry^reset; first.

Texts.Chs: 当涉及到高端技术时，电路板是必需的。它可以制造出令人叹服的科学设备。研究^orange;工程学^reset;以显示更多。
Texts.Eng: Circuitboards are essential when it comes to higher-end tech. Higher-end boards produce amazing machines. Research into ^orange;Engineering^reset; might reveal more.
Miscellaneous pieces of metal, ^orange;Spare Parts^reset; may seem odd to collect until you consider the tungsten they can be extracted for. Try it. You'll see!
Mutavisk silk woven into a ^orange;Bio Thread^reset;, ready for application in the lab. I think you'll be pleased with what it can do for you.

Texts.Chs: 营养糊由食物萃取的糊状物。它是实验室的主要原料，你会需要大量这种物质。
Texts.Eng: Raw, untarnished paste created from small samples of material. This is a staple in every lab, and you'll go through a ton of it.
Repulsive and goopy, ^orange;Blister Sack^reset; stinks like excrement before refinement. When refined, however, it has many uses.

Texts.Chs: 树脂是一种坚硬的物质，主要用于制作保护性护甲。
Texts.Eng: Resin is a hard substance that has applications primarily in protective gear.

Texts.Chs: 绿色黏液看上去没什么用，实际上你可以在做出很多有趣的玩意儿。例如，一件由黏液制成的护甲？通过正确地研究^orange;盔甲和武器^reset;，你可以将之变成现实。
Texts.Eng: Slimey goop may not seem useful, until you actually use some in a lab. Imagine, armor made of slime? You can make it a reality with the right Research into ^orange;Armor and Weapons^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 矿物样品是实验中不可或缺的材料。没有它，你将无法种植出高等植物。
Texts.Eng: Strictly for lab use, mineral samples none the less prove to be essential. Without them you'll be unable to produce advanced plant life.
Super tough, super malleable and utterly resistant to radiation of almost all sorts, this ^orange;Mutavisk Silk^reset; can be made into great clothing and armor.
Take this ^orange;Magnesium Powder^reset; and use it to create advanced genes, or to help destabilize otherwise completely stable particles.

Texts.Chs: 这些被称作^orange;升级模块^reset;的小盒子非常有用。它们允许你通过你的^orange;个人三度仪^reset;升级你的武器和盔甲，如果你使用^yellow;原版飞船^reset;选项，也能用来升级你的飞船执照。
Texts.Eng: These little boxes, known as ^orange;Upgrade Modules^reset;, are extremely useful. They will allow you to upgrade your weapons and armor via your ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; as well as upgrade your ship license if using the ^yellow;Vanilla Ship^reset; option.

Texts.Chs: 这件古代遗物看起来极有价值！你可以卖掉它以获取大量像素……或许你还会发现其他的用途。在^orange;显微镜^reset;下研究以显示更多信息。
Texts.Eng: This ancient relic looks quite valuable! You could sell it for exorbitant amounts of pixels...or perhaps you'll find other uses. A ^orange;Microscope^reset; might reveal more information.

Texts.Chs: 遗传物质是你研究基因工程最关键的材料！
Texts.Eng: This sample of genetic material will prove to be an absolute necessity in your laboratory.
This strange substance ^orange;Fungal Ichor^reset; is fungal in nature, with a sort of sticky property that adheres to any organic matter.

This vile ^orange;Caliginous Gas^reset; really screws up your movement ability within it due to neurological effects that permeate even specially treated membranes, and can cause long-term damage to the psyche and immune system.

Texts.Chs: 科技卡用于创造更好的科技，如果你需要跳的更高，冲刺得更远，或者变成微小的小球以穿过孔洞时，它将会非常有用。
Texts.Eng: Used in the creation of better tech, ^orange;Tech Cards^reset; are valuable finds that you should save for when you need to jump higher or dash farther or tuck into tiny little spheres to get through holes.
Used primarily in medical and agricultural practices, ^orange;Magnesium Sulfate^reset; makes for a very handy additive in some intravenous drugs, or soil enrichment from fertilizers.
Who doesn't love ^orange;Oxygen^reset;, am I right? Breathing is great! But oxygen has many other uses. Poke around in your lab and see.
With ^orange;Iodine^reset; available, graphene and methyl iodide become relatively simple to produce. I'd collect as much as you can.
With ^orange;Leather^reset;, you can fashion some wonderful protection from harm or the elements. Researching ^orange;Craftsmanship^reset; should reveal more.
Without ^orange;fertilizer^reset;, you'll have a tougher time making and growing plants. It is especially useful in ^orange;Hydroponic Trays^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 你不能在这里使用船员合同。
Texts.Eng: You cannot use that crew contract here.

You'll need a fair amount of ^orange;Ammonium Sulfate^reset; in your lab work. Without it you'll be unable to produce high quality fertilizers! Research into ^orange;Chemistry^reset; will reveal more.

You've found some ^orange;Bone^reset;. While somewhat grisly and primitive it can still produce various useful goods including weapons and armor. Access your ^green;[C]rafting^reset; menu and select the Weapons tab to make them after researching into the ^orange;Armor and Weapons^reset; tree.

Texts.Chs: 感谢^cyan;高级塑料^reset;，你已经开启了一个全新的研究分支。据说蕨树对于创建大量的塑料非常有帮助。研究^orange;农业学^reset;以显示更多。
Texts.Eng: You've opened up a whole new branch of research thanks to ^cyan;Advanced Plastic^reset;. They say that Bracken trees can greatly help to create plenty of plastic. Research into ^orange;Agriculture^reset; might reveal more.
^orange;Bamboo^reset; will have little use in your lab, but it might just help you build a fancy jungle hut!
^orange;Bioluminescent Spores^reset; can glow in the dark, surely they will be useful for your laboratory creations. Check it out!
^orange;Calcium Nitrate^reset; is an essential element in pesticides and fertilizers. You'll need some of this stuff if you plan to have a profitable farm.
^orange;Corvex^reset; is a laboratory miracle. It can allegedly bind certain elements at a sub-atomic level and create entirely new sorts of physics as a result.
^orange;Endomorphic Jelly^reset; is a bizarre stuff. It can be shaped very specifically with relative ease. This means weapons, armor and equipment of a most odd sort.
^orange;Helium-3^reset; is both a fuel and energy source. It also creates an unusual effect when in large clouds, leading to hilarity in exploration.
^orange;Hydrogen^reset; gas can be applied in a variety of ways, though you'll find it best suited for ^orange;Chemistry^reset; and ^orange;Agriculture^reset;.

^orange;Koanite^reset; is another extractable ore that provides direct benefits to your lab work. A fine crystal, it can be useful with the proper application. Place in your ^orange;Extractor^reset; and off you go!
^orange;Methyl Iodide^reset; has but one use, and that is in the creation of pesticides. These help with hydroponics trays, producing more valuable resources.

^orange;Mining lasers^reset; are a useful alternative to a Manipulator. They can function one-handed, and can be upgraded up to 20 times through your ^orange;Tricorder^reset;. It's worth it. They get quite powerful.
^orange;Nitrogen^reset; can be found in abundance all over the place if you know where to look. You'll want a fair amount of it in your research.
^orange;Pesticide^reset; is exceptionally useful for farmers, providing a simple and effective method for pest control. Research into ^orange;Chemistry^reset; will reveal more.
^orange;Putrid Slime^reset; is really quite gross. You'll find it has a few rather interesting uses through research into ^orange;Chemistry^reset;.

^orange;Repair Guns^reset; allow you to repair your Mech in the field. They can be upgraded up to 20 times in a ^orange;Tool Upgrade Table^reset; once you build one. You'll find one in your Machining Table. It's worth it. They get quite powerful.
^orange;Salt^reset; is quite abundant (especially in water) and applied as a resource in numerous scientific branches.

^orange;Silicon^reset; has a range of uses, though for our purposes it will be used for technological devices such as microchips. Research into ^orange;Electronics^reset; and ^orange;Engineering^reset; will reveal more.
^orange;Silk^reset; is a high quality textile that has many useful applications, including high-end plastics using advanced knowledge in ^orange;Chemistry^reset;.
